attributes.action: give Jimmy Osmond an honary Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jimmy Osmond is an extraordinary man. 

He managed to survive being a child star (Long Haired Lover from Liverpool was a Christmas number 1 in 1973) to become a huge supporter of charities in the UK and worldwide - this has already been recognised by the Variety Club of Great Britian. 

Jimmy is a billionaire who conducts his businesses with the highest level of integrity. He also happens to be a throughly nice and decent person.

Jimmy deserves to be recognised here in the UK as well as in his home country (maybe Mr Browne could mention it to Mr Bush next time they have a chat?)
